price: ߊ߬ ߣߌ߫ ߛߴߊߟߊ߫ ߘߌ߫ ߟߊߒߠߦߊߓߊ߮ ߟߎ߫ ߓߎ߰ߓߎ߯ ߸ ߞߊ߬ ߓߊ߲߬ߓߊ߮ ߟߎ߬ ߖߐ߲ߝߐ߲߫
arabic: وَلِيُمَحِّصَ ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَيَمۡحَقَ ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: waliyumaḥḥiṣa al-lahu alladhīna āmanū wayamḥaqa al-kāfirīna
